      • subjectFromId

        default Subject subjectFromId​(java.lang.Long id)
        Generating the fromId for all mappers if the databaseType is sql, as the class has relationship to it might need it, instead of creating a new attribute to know if the entity has any relationship from some other entity.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the entity
        Returns:
        the entity instance
